Burbank.Burbank City Hall:
Burbank City Hall is the site of the municipal government of Burbank, California, and is listed on the National Register of Historic Places.
Designed by architects William Allen and W. George Lutzi in the Moderne or Art Deco style, ground was broken in February 1941 and construction was completed in 1943. The structure was partially funded by the Federal Works Agency, Works Progress Administration (WPA).
